sys_sg_write_back_action_item.name: Create Work Order
sys_sg_write_back_action_item.template: number={{Input: number}}^caller_id={{Input: caller}}^category={{Input: category}}^subcategory={{Input: subcategory}}^business_service={{Input: service}}^service_offering={{Input: service_offering}}^cmdb_ci={{Input: configuration_item}}^state={{Input: state}}^location={{Input: location}}^impact={{Input: impact}}^urgency={{Input: urgency}}^priority={{Input: priority}}^assignment_group={{Input: assigned_group}}^assigned_to={{Input: assigned_to}}^short_description={{Input: short_description}}^description={{Input: description}}^close_code={{Input: resolution_code}}^close_notes={{Input: resolution_notes}}^EQ
